messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Dear Crew, May we all have a safe shift and work under the the feeling of a safe area

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Service.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Would Robotics please make a floor bot, I learned that when the station looks like shit it goes to shit

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Quarter Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.
